title: Static Analysis

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to external storage.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.description: Allows the application to access the phone features of the device. An application with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and so on.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.RESTART_PACKAGES.description: Allows an application to kill background processes of other applications, even if memory is not low.

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate
Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android <7.0
Application is signed with SHA1withRSA. SHA1 hash algorithm is known to have collision issues.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig=@xml/network_security_config]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
manifest_analysis.desc: The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup] flag is missing.

manifest_analysis.title:
Content Provider (com.dreammirae.otp.android.mirae.CompanyProvider) would not be Protected if the application ran on a device where the the API level was less than 17.
[Content Provider, targetSdkVersion >= 17]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Content Provider( Content Provider) would be exported if the application ran on a device where the the API level was less than 17. In that situation, it would be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device.
manifest_analysis.name: would not be Protected if the application ran on a device where the the API level was less than 17.[Content Provider, targetSdkVersion >= 17]

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (com.dreammirae.otp.android.mirae.OTPAppMonitorReceiver) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

network_security.description: Domain config is insecurely configured to permit clear text traffic to these domains in scope.

nx.description: The shared object has NX bit set. This marks a memory page non-executable making attacker injected shellcode non-executable.

stack_canary.description: This shared object has a stack canary value added to the stack so that it will be overwritten by a stack buffer that overflows the return address. This allows detection of overflows by verifying the integrity of the canary before function return.

relocation_readonly.description: This shared object has full RELRO enabled. RELRO ensures that the GOT cannot be overwritten in vulnerable ELF binaries. In Full RELRO, the entire GOT (.got and .got.plt both) is marked as read-only.

rpath.description: The shared object does not have run-time search path or RPATH set.

runpath.description: The shared object does not have RUNPATH set.

fortify.description: The shared object does not have any fortified functions. Fortified functions provides buffer overflow checks against glibc's commons insecure functions like strcpy, gets etc. Use the compiler option -D_FORTIFY_SOURCE=2 to fortify functions.

stack_canary.description: This shared object has a stack canary value added to the stack so that it will be overwritten by a stack buffer that overflows the return address. This allows detection of overflows by verifying the integrity of the canary before function return.

relocation_readonly.description: This shared object has full RELRO enabled. RELRO ensures that the GOT cannot be overwritten in vulnerable ELF binaries. In Full RELRO, the entire GOT (.got and .got.plt both) is marked as read-only.

nx.description: The shared object has NX bit set. This marks a memory page non-executable making attacker injected shellcode non-executable.

stack_canary.description: This shared object has a stack canary value added to the stack so that it will be overwritten by a stack buffer that overflows the return address. This allows detection of overflows by verifying the integrity of the canary before function return.

relocation_readonly.description: This shared object does not have RELRO enabled. The entire GOT (.got and .got.plt both) are writable. Without this compiler flag, buffer overflows on a global variable can overwrite GOT entries. Use the option -z,relro,-z,now to enable full RELRO and only -z,relro to enable partial RELRO.

metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.
metadata.cwe: CWE-532 Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File

metadata.description: App uses SQLite Database and execute raw SQL query. Untrusted user input in raw SQL queries can cause SQL Injection. Also sensitive information should be encrypted and written to the database.
metadata.cwe: CWE-89 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has access to ['network connectivity'].

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has user/application initiated network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FMT_MEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke the mechanisms recommended by the platform vendor for storing and setting configuration options.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt any data in traffic or does not transmit any data between itself and another trusted IT product.

strings: "msg_input_pin_not_match_1" : "パスワード入力に失敗しました。"

"help_desc_pin_change" : "パスワードは、AnyOTP実行時に個人認証のため使用される番号です。パスワードは、ユーザー所有のモバイル機器の紛失や盗難時に、他のユーザーがユーザーのAnyOTP利用を防ぐために設けられています。パスワードは他の人に知られないように注意し、又、推測されやすいユーザー個人に関わる番号（誕生日など）などの使用はお控えください。 パスワードは数字の6桁で設定できます。123456のような連番や111111のように連なった数字（ゾロ番）の使用は出来ません。パスワード入力を5回以上間違えるとAnyOTPが使用出来なくなります。再度AnyOTPを使用するためには、インストールされたアプリケーションを1度削除した後、再インストールを行った上、管理者が新しい認証コードを再発行する必要があります。"
"second" : "초"
"msg_error_ce2001" : "認証サーバとの通信に、障害が発生しました。申し訳ありませんが、しばらくしてから再度アクセスをお願い申し上げます。"

"msg_fail_count_over" : "비밀번호 허용입력오류횟수(5회)를 초과 하였습니다. 관리자에게 새로운 인증코드를 요청하십시요."

"sever_ret_code_msg_GE1001" : "認証サーバとの通信に、障害が発生しました。申し訳ありませんが、しばらくしてから再度アクセスをお願い申し上げます。"

"help_desc_pin_change" : "Password is an authentication code for AnyOTP. This is for security when your device is lost or stolen so that other users cannot use OTP. We recommend you not to use a password which is common or related to your personal information. NEVER reveal your password. You can set 6-digit password and you cannot use the same or straight numbers. If you input incorrect password over 5 times, your use will be restricted and you can only resume use after you get a new authentication code from website."

"sever_ret_code_msg_SE3003" : "The password is incorrect."

"help_desc_service_guid" : "미래테크놀로지가 제공하는 ANYOTP 서비스는 사용자의 모바일기기에서 일회용 비밀번호(One Time Password)를 생성하여 개인 인증을 처리하는 모바일 보안 서비스입니다. 일회용 비밀번호는 6자리 숫자로 구성되어 있으며, 1분마다 새로운 비밀번호를 생성합니다. 미래테크놀로지의 ANYOTP 서비스를 이용함으로써 비밀번호 해킹, 개인정보 유출 및 도용과 같은 보안사고로부터 사용자의 개인정보를 안전하게 보호할 수 있습니다."
"loading" : "loading"
"sever_ret_code_msg_SE3002" : "비밀번호 잠김해제 요청을 아직 하지 않으셨습니다. 관리자에게 비밀번호 잠김해제 요청을 하신 후 다시 시도하세요."

"help_desc_accident_recover" : "휴대폰 분실 및 기타 사유로 OTP인증에 대한 사고신고를 웹 또는 유선으로 신청한 상태에서, 재사용을 위한 사고신고 해지요청을 웹이나 유선으로 한 이후 OTP 인증 서비스를 다시 사용할 때, 폰에서 사고 회복 서비스를 처리하여야 인증처리가 됩니다."

"help_desc_fail_count" : "パスワード入力が5回失敗した場合は、該当AnyOTPを使用できない(ロックがかかる)ようになっております。利用を再開する場合、AnyOTPの再インストールが必要になりますので、管理者にご連絡ください。"

"help_desc_service_guid" : "AnyOTP service is a mobile security service to create a one time-use password and process to authenticate a user's mobile device. The 6-digit one time-use password creates new password every minute. AnyOTP service can secure your personal information from accidents including data spill, theft and password hacking."

"msg_pin_error" : "You have entered your password incorrectly 5 times and your account is now locked. You will need to resend your OTP ID & auth code and reinstall your authenticator. If you are still having trouble, please contact support."

"msg_pin_desc" : "Please set 6-digit password and you cannot use the same or straight numbers."

"msg_pin_error" : "비밀번호가 5회 이상 잘못 입력되어 AnyOTP 를 사용하실 수 없습니다. 관리자에게 새로운 인증코드를 발급받고 재설치 하셔야 합니다."

"msg_input_pin_not_match_2" : "time"

"help_desc_pin_change" : "비밀번호는 ANYOTP를 실행할 때 사용하는 인증번호로써, 모바일 기기의 분실 또는 도난 시 다른 사용자가 OTP를 사용하지 못하도록 하기 위함이므로, 노출에 주의하시고 번호 유추가 쉽거나 개인과 관련된 비밀번호는 사용하지 않는 것을 권장합니다.
 비밀번호는 6자리 숫자로 설정이 가능하며, 연속된 숫자 및 동일한 숫자로 사용하실 수 없습니다. 비밀번호 입력이 5회 이상 틀릴 경우, 사용이 제한되며, 관리자로부터 새로운 인증코드를 발급받으셔야 다시 사용 가능합니다."
"sever_ret_code_msg_SE3002" : "パスワードがロックされました。管理者にお問合わせください。"

"msg_ipnut_pin_max_length" : "OTP 비밀번호 6자리를 입력해 주십시요."
"msg_pin_desc" : "パスワードは数字の6桁で設定できます。123456のような連番や111111のように連なった数字（ゾロ番）の使用は出来ません。"

"help_desc_service_guid" : "AnyOTPサービスは、ユーザーのモバイル機器に一度きり使用可能なパスワード（One Time Password）を生成し、個人認証の処理を行うモバイルセキュリティサービスです。AnyOTPサービスは、誰でもAppStoreから気軽にダウンロードして御利用していただくことが可能です。ワンタイムパスワードは数字6桁から構成されており、1分毎に新しいパスワードが生成されます。未来テクノロジーのAnyOTPサービスは、パスワードのハッキングや個人情報流出及び盗用などのセキュリティトラブルからユーザーの個人情報を安全に守ります。"
"help_desc_authkey_update" : "인증키란 OTP 번호를 생성하기 위한 자료입니다. 이와 같은 자료를 새로이 발급을 받고자할 때 사용하는 서비스 입니다."
"sever_ret_code_msg_SE3006" : "OTPが破棄されました。"

playstore_details.title: AnyOTP
playstore_details.description: AnyOTP is a one time password generating programme which safely protects players’ accounts in games that published by NTTGame.  Once you match your account with AnyOTP, you will be asked to enter one time password of Any OTP everytime you try to login game. Person who doesn’t have this code is not allowed to reach the account under no circumstance. One time passwords are regenerated in each minute and it not possible to guess it.
playstore_details.summary: Keep your account safe with Any OTP!
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Keep your account safe with Any OTP!
playstore_details.recentChanges: Upgrade the target SDK Version 28 (Android Pie)
playstore_details.recentChangesHTML: Upgrade the target SDK Version 28 (Android Pie)
